mapper.insert: insert into member_info values(#{memberId}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, sysdate, default, #{member_birth}, #{auth_code})
mapper.select: select * from member_info where member_name=#{member_name} and phone=#{phone} and member_status='Y'
select * from member_info where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} and email=#{email} and member_status='Y'
select * from MEMBER_INFO where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} and member_status='Y'
mapper.update: update member_info set member_name=#{member_name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, gender=#{gender}, member_birth=#{member_birth}, member_status=default where MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
